name: part_010
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ生誕祭】ポルカプロデュース!最強アイドルグループ3DLIVE! [ywvR52V7HiI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Ending of the song 'Maware! Setsugetsuka' performed by Omaru Polka, Shiranui Flare, and Tsunomaki Watame.
MC section where Polka addresses the audience and introduces the next part of the live.
Performance of the song 'HOLOGRAM CIRCUS' featuring various Hololive members.

subtitles.original: この宴は続く
subtitles.english: This banquet continues

subtitles.original: 踊れ　歌え　一心不乱に回れ
subtitles.english: Dance, sing, spin with all your heart

subtitles.original: 今宵は何曜日か？
subtitles.english: What day of the week is it tonight?

subtitles.original: 水木金？
subtitles.english: Wed, Thu, Fri?

subtitles.original: 土日月火？
subtitles.english: Sat, Sun, Mon, Tue?

subtitles.original: はっ！はっ！はっ！はっ！はいっ！はっ！はっ！はっ！はいっ！
subtitles.english: Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha! Hai! Ha! Ha! Ha! Hai!

subtitles.original: ぽーん！
subtitles.english: Pon!

subtitles.original: ここまで来たらもう最後のお祭りだ！全員で行くぞー！うおおおお！
subtitles.english: Now that we've come this far, it's the final festival! Let's go everyone! Uooooo!

subtitles.original:
HOLOGRAM CIRCUS
作詞 / 作曲：なつめ千秋
subtitles.english:
HOLOGRAM CIRCUS
Lyrics / Composition: Natsume Chiaki

subtitles.original: ウェルカム！
subtitles.english: Welcome!

subtitles.original: 今日はポルカプロデュースライブ！
subtitles.english: Today is the Polka-produced live!

subtitles.original: そしてポルカの誕生日ライブにお越しいただき、本当に本当にありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: And thank you so, so much for coming to Polka's birthday live!

subtitles.original: たくさんの仲間たちが来てくれて、すっごい嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy that so many of my friends came!

subtitles.original: 語彙が無くなっちゃった！あははは！
subtitles.english: I've run out of words! Ahahaha!

subtitles.original: それでもみんなが横に居るからポルカは頑張っていられます！
subtitles.english: But because everyone is by my side, Polka can keep doing her best!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！そしてまた次の誕生日、これからもよろしくね！
subtitles.english: Thank you! And for the next birthday, please keep supporting me!

subtitles.original: 準備はできてますか？行くぜ！Are you ready?
subtitles.english: Are you ready? Let's go! Are you ready?

subtitles.original: さあさあ近くにおいで　きっと誰もが仰天
subtitles.english: Come, come, come closer. Surely everyone will be amazed.

subtitles.original: 奇想天外なショーの始まりさ
subtitles.english: It's the start of a fantastic show.

subtitles.original: ぐっと惹かれるでしょう？
subtitles.english: You'll be strongly attracted, right?

subtitles.original: おっと押さないでね
subtitles.english: Oops, don't push.

subtitles.original: それでは準備OKですか？
subtitles.english: So, are you ready?

subtitles.original: 愉快な動物たち　玉乗りピエロ
subtitles.english: Cheerful animals, ball-rolling clowns.

subtitles.original: ハラハラドキドキしちゃうでしょ
subtitles.english: It'll make your heart pound with excitement, right?

subtitles.original: 真っ赤な輪くぐらせ　綱渡りして
subtitles.english: Going through the bright red hoop, walking on the tightrope.

subtitles.original: ちょっとくらいのドジなんてご愛嬌よ
subtitles.english: A little bit of clumsiness is just part of the charm.

subtitles.original: Come on! Light up!
subtitles.english: Come on! Light up!

subtitles.original: とっておきのライブ　ボーッとしてないで
subtitles.english: A special live. Don't just stand there blankly.

subtitles.original: もっとさ　もっと　手を叩こう！
subtitles.english: More, more, let's clap our hands!

subtitles.original: ほらほらついておいで　目も回るような
subtitles.english: Look, look, come along. A circus that makes your head spin.

subtitles.original: サーカス　きっとここだけだよ
subtitles.english: It's definitely only here.

subtitles.original: ホログラムみたい　キラキラ
subtitles.english: Like a hologram, sparkling

subtitles.original: 奇跡が踊る
subtitles.english: miracles dance.

subtitles.original: いつかは世界中を
subtitles.english: Someday I'll

subtitles.original: 虜にしちゃうぞ
subtitles.english: captivate the whole world.

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Hai!

subtitles.original: 行くぜ、2番！みこち！
subtitles.english: Let's go, part 2! Mikochi!

subtitles.original: うーん　明日の演目はどうしよっかな
subtitles.english: Hmm, what should tomorrow's program be?

subtitles.original: 屋根裏で秘密の作戦会議さ
subtitles.english: A secret strategy meeting in the attic.

subtitles.original: いっぱいの観客席　あっと驚くような
subtitles.english: A full audience. Let's show them

subtitles.original: とびきりのショーを見せましょう
subtitles.english: an extraordinary show that will surprise them.

subtitles.original: 思い付いたら　ジッとしてられない
subtitles.english: Once I think of it, I can't sit still.

subtitles.original: 座員を引き連れて Let's go!
subtitles.english: Taking the troupe along, Let's go!

subtitles.original: ねえあれがやりたい　これもやりたい
subtitles.english: Hey, I want to do that, I want to do this too.

subtitles.original: どうして時間って足りないの？
subtitles.english: Why isn't there enough time?

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai!

subtitles.original: みんな！最後まで盛り上がっていけー！うおおおお！行くぜ！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Keep getting excited until the end! Uooooo! Let's go!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai!

subtitles.original: 手拍子、お願いしまーす！
subtitles.english: Clap your hands, please!

subtitles.original: ペンライト振ってる人はもっともっと振って！みんなの色、振っちゃって！
subtitles.english: Those waving penlights, wave them more and more! Wave everyone's colors!

subtitles.original: 最後行きます
subtitles.english: Here's the last part.

subtitles.original: 上手くいかなくって　空回りってばかりで
subtitles.english: When things don't go well and I'm just spinning my wheels.

subtitles.original: 少し落ち込んじゃう日もあるけれど
subtitles.english: There are days when I feel a little down,

subtitles.original: 見ててね
subtitles.english: but watch me.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫！いつまでも
subtitles.english: It's okay! I can't

subtitles.original: クヨクヨしてらんないし
subtitles.english: mope forever.

subtitles.original: 顔を上げて　今日のステージがほら
subtitles.english: Lifting my head, look, today's stage is

subtitles.original: ね！待ってるのさ
subtitles.english: See! It's waiting for us.

subtitles.original: ポルカ！ポルカ！ポルカ！ポルカ！ポルカ！ポルカ！
subtitles.english: Polka! Polka! Polka! Polka! Polka! Polka!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございまーす！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 先輩たちと一緒に歌ってもらって！ポルカ降ります！ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: I had the senpais sing with me! Polka is coming down! Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: やばい、もうめっちゃテンション上がっちゃって！ドギマギしちゃってるんで！あれ？ちょっと待って、時間がわかんない！え、もうでも、まだ大丈夫だよね！？
subtitles.english: Oh no, I'm getting so pumped up! My heart is pounding! Wait? Hold on, I don't know the time! Uh, but it's still okay, right!?

subtitles.original: いくぜ！
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: 強く強く願うんだ　どんな夢だって
subtitles.english: Wish strongly, strongly. Any dream,

subtitles.original: そうきっと叶うはず
subtitles.english: yes, surely it will come true.

subtitles.original: 何も怖くない　ポルカの声は全部　ちゃんと届いてるよ
subtitles.english: Nothing is scary. All of Polka's voice is reaching properly.

subtitles.original: さあ新しい次元　新しい舞台へ
subtitles.english: Now to a new dimension, to a new stage.

subtitles.original: もっとさ　もっと　突き進もう！
subtitles.english: More, more, let's push forward!

subtitles.original: まだまだついておいで　笑い転げちゃう
subtitles.english: Keep following us. A circus that will make you

subtitles.original: サーカス　絶対ここだけだよ
subtitles.english: roll with laughter. It's definitely only here.

subtitles.original: 初めての仲間　景色に心も踊る
subtitles.english: First friends. My heart dances with the scenery.

subtitles.original: 今にも世界中を　虜にしちゃうから
subtitles.english: Because I'm about to captivate the whole world.
